name: Soul Bound (Soul Bound)
description:
Installation: Download the .zip file, open it, open Soul Bound app

Game: A twin stick shooter, where you kill enemies to gain their souls. However! you can only stay on the path of the light but can expand this path by spreading those exercised souls.

Tutorial:

Mouse and Keyboard:
wasd or arrows to move,
Left click to shoot arrow,
Right click to shoot souls,
Aim with mouse
Esc to end the game

GamePad:

Left joystick to move,
Right joystick to aim,
Right trigger to shoot arrow,
Left trigger to shoot souls,
Esc to end the game

Made by Luke Hawkins, Jessica Hammer and Xiaochen Hou
